name: Underworld Sentinel
description: A Huge undead being embodying the essence of undead power, resembling a guardian with a scythe.
memorable: Its ability to restrict healing on its foes while delivering devastating melee attacks makes it a challenging adversary.
goals: To guard its domain and challenge intruders with powerful melee and necrotic attacks.
relations: May serve other powerful undead or function as a guardian of dark places.
environment: Typically found in dark, foreboding locations like ruined castles or ancient burial grounds.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and effects that would turn undead, along with strong melee and ranged attacks.
weaknesses: Limited mobility beyond a normal walking speed and reliant on physical combat.
attacks: Devastating melee scythe attacks with slashing and necrotic damage, as well as a necrotic ranged attack.
most_powerful_ability: Grim Reaping, allowing it to damage multiple foes at once while preventing them from healing.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet and darkvision up to 120 feet.
skills: Proficient in Dexterity, Constitution, and Wisdom saving throws, making it tough against endurance and perception challenges.
additional_information: Can make opportunity attacks when creatures enter or leave its reach.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to Undead Nature.
Deals additional necrotic damage when attacking weakened foes.
test_queries: undead giant with area control capabilities
